title: Senior Economic Officer – International Opportunities (London, Munich, Paris, Tokyo)
organization: Ministry of Economic Development, Job Creation and Trade
division: Trade and International Engagement / International Representation Branch
position_details: 4 English Temporary, duration up to 36 months, 777 Bay St, Toronto, Toronto Region
compensation_group: Association of Management, Administrative and Professional Crown Employees of Ontario
about_the_job:
As a Senior Economic Officer, you'll work with provincial, federal, and international partners to position Ontario as a top destination for investment and trade. You'll lead strategic initiatives, support trade missions, host delegations, and raise Ontario's profile through media and outreach. Your insights will help shape policy and drive economic growth across borders.

About the Team

You'll be part of the International Representation Branch within the Trade and International Engagement Division — a dynamic team that connects Ontario to the world.

With offices in Canadian embassies and consulates across Europe, Asia, and the Americas, our Trade and Investment Offices are led by experts who understand the unique needs of their markets — and the competitive advantages Ontario offers. We're also a key resource for local economic development teams looking to attract foreign investment or expand into global markets.

Want to learn more?
Join our information session on November 6th from 10am to 10:45am to hear directly from the hiring manager about the role, the team, and what it's like working at the Ministry. Please Register Here 

**Attendance at the session is optional and will have no impact on hiring decisions.
what_you_bring:
Mandatory requirements:
• you are a Canadian Citizen
• you have the ability to obtain and maintain Top Secret Security Clearance from the Government of Canada
• you have the ability to obtain and maintain Canadian Diplomatic Passport and Diplomatic Accreditation / Visa in host country (cannot hold citizenship of host country)
• you are able to undergo Medical / Fitness for Duty Assessment


Explore the Opportunities:
Click the links below to view and apply for each of the four positions. Each posting includes full details about the role, location, and how to apply.

Location: Canadian Embassy, Paris, France
